products.name: Cloudultra 2 Trail Running Shoe
products.brandedName: On Cloudultra 2 Trail Running Shoe
products.description: Designed to maximize ground contact on any terrain, this trail-running shoe sets a foot-hugging sock on plush cushioning and grippy lugs for miles of comfort.Perfect for: Trail runners who want cushioning, rebound and grippy confidence navigating packed dirt, loose gravel, rocks, roots and everything else the ground puts in the way.Upper: The stretchy sock made of recycled fibers provides step-in convenience and helps keep dirt and debris out while letting air in. FlipRelease™ lacing lets you lock in the perfect fit and relieve pressure when you’re recovering from a run.Midsole Drop: 5mm. Classified as a mid-drop measurement, it pushes your foot forward to support a more natural mid/forefoot strike.Sole: CloudTec® cushioning molded from Helion™ superfoam softens every landing on any kind of terrain. A TPU Speedboard® flexes and rebounds to transform each footstrike into propulsive energy. The lugged Missiongrip™ tread keeps every stride grounded on loose, uneven and hilly surfaces for miles of distraction-free confidence. Trail: provides superior stability and traction on hills, uneven surfaces and changing terrain Energy return: transforms every heel strike into responsive, explosive forward movement Cushioning: absorbs impact and distributes weight for consistent, buoyant comfort under each step Pull-on sock upper with external lacing cage Removable, cushioned insole allows for custom orthotics FlipRelease lacing clip relieves pressure on tired feet with the flip of a switch Helion superfoam cushioning delivers lightweight energy return even in hot and cold temperatures Speedboard construction moves naturally with your foot to transform every heel strike into an explosive toe-off CloudTec sole provides a smooth ride that moves naturally with each stride Missiongrip multidirectional lugs in the tread maintain superior grip on changing terrain Textile and synthetic upper and lining/rubber and synthetic sole Imported

Alongside their signature hyper-feminine dresses and matching sets, pieces come alive with quilted fabrics, intricate florals, fringe, and the rich embroideries that first propelled the brand to fame. The 'Amanda' crop top is made from pure cotton embellished with delicate hand-stitched beads along the neckline. Complete the look with the [matching skirt](https://www.modaoperandi.com/women/p/agua-by-agua-bendita/bergamota-maxi-skirt/608890).

products.name: Crown Vintage Milena Wedge Sandal
products.brandedName: Crown Vintage Milena Wedge Sandal
products.description: Brunch with the girls, your cousin's graduation party, and your neighbor's backyard barbeque- looks like you're booked this weekend! Busy days call for a classic- that's why this season, we're reaching for the Milena wedge sandals from Crown Vintage. What they are: A pair of sandals, complete with a fisherman-inspired strappy upper, a standout platform, and an ultra-high heel. Why you’ll love them: The timeless silhouette and neutral hue seamlessly matches with your favorite warm weather outfits, while the wedge heel keeps your strides sturdy. How we’d wear them: Opt for a tiered sundress for a look that is breezy and stylish. Finish off the look by accessorizing with goldtone jewelry and a round raffia purse.

products.name: Adirondack Parka 2.0
products.brandedName: UGG Adirondack Parka 2.0
products.description: 3-in-1 convertible quarter-length hooded tech parka with internal jacket Temperature rated at -32° Celsius \r\n Parka: Self - Waterproof Woven - 62% Polyester / 38% Cotton Waterproof tech fabric shell (Fabric passes AATCC127 Water Proof Test- rain or snow cannot penetrate the fabric) Lining - 100% Nylon Fill - 90/10 Premium Certified RDS down with 700 fill power Adjustable cuffs for increased weather protection Chest welt pockets with snaps Front patch pockets with UGG® logo snap closures Soft fleece "hand warmer" pocket linings Internal drawcord at waist Internal cell phone pocket Side vents with zipper closures for addded mobility Reverse coil waterproof zippers with UGG® logo metal pulls UGG® silicone logo patch 35" HPS Length [Size S] Dry clean only \r\n Internal quilted and plush fleece jacket: Reverse to wear plush fleece face out when worn alone Self -100% Polyester plush fleece, 55% Polyester / 45% Recycled Polyester Lining - Unlined Fill - 90/10 Premium Certified RDS down with 700 fill power Storm cuffs with thumbhole Reverse coil zippers with UGG® logo pulls Drawcord with UGG® logo stoppers at hood Side welt pockets Soft fleece "hand warmer" pocket linings 28" HPS Length [Size S] Dry clean only Imported Offering protection from the weather, be it mild or wild, the Adirondack parka is three jackets in one. The outer shell of waterproof tech fabric keeps you dry and rebuffs the wind. The removable and reversible inner jacket features quilted and plush fleece. Its premium down fill means this parka is rated for temperatures as low as -32°C (-25.6°F) when worn together.

products.name: Polar Flare II Jacket - Houndstooth
products.brandedName: Perfect Moment Polar Flare II Jacket - Houndstooth
products.description: Perfect Moment's bestselling Polar flare jacket is perfect for skiing in style. This women's ski jacket has 700-fill-power down for extra warmth while on the slopes, and has enough pockets to fit all of your ski-day essentials. This jacket is cut for a cropped fit and sizes slightly small for a snug style. We recommend you pair with our high-waist Aurora ski pants to cover you when wearing this cropped jacket.This Jacket features:- Full-front zip closure- Two front-zip pockets- Internal goggle pocket and cloth cleaner- Adjustable powder skirt- Helmet compatible hood- flared sleeves with ribbed cuffs- High-neck collar- Fully lined with 700-fill power down insulation.
